importomics 0.99.0
  • Reference

Read affymetrix microarray

read_affymetrix.Rd

Read affymetrix microarray

read_affymetrix(celfiles)

Arguments

celfiles

string vector: CEL file paths

Value

RangedSummarizedExperiment

Examples

require(magrittr)
url <- paste0('http://www.bioconductor.org/help/publications/2003/',
                'Chiaretti/chiaretti2/T33.tgz')
localfile <- file.path('~/importomicscache', basename(url))
if (!file.exists(localfile)){
    download.file(url, destfile = localfile)
    untar(localfile, exdir = path.expand('~/importomicscache'))
}
localfile %<>% substr(1, nchar(.)-4)
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)){
    install.packages('BiocManager')
}
BiocManager::install('hgu95av2.db')

#> Bioconductor version 3.11 (BiocManager 1.30.10), R 4.0.1 (2020-06-06)
#> Installing package(s) 'hgu95av2.db'
#> installing the source package 'hgu95av2.db'
#> Installation path not writeable, unable to update packages: MASS, mgcv, nlme,
#>   survival
#> Old packages: 'affyio', 'backports', 'Biobase', 'BiocParallel', 'Biostrings',
#>   'bit', 'bit64', 'data.table', 'DelayedArray', 'ellipsis',
#>   'GenomicAlignments', 'GenomicRanges', 'glue', 'IRanges', 'karyoploteR',
#>   'limma', 'mixOmics', 'preprocessCore', 'Rcpp', 'Rsamtools', 'Rsubread',
#>   'rtracklayer', 'S4Vectors', 'stringi', 'tibble', 'XML', 'XVector', 'zlibbioc'
read_affymetrix(celfiles = list.files(localfile, full.names = TRUE))
